DataElement.preferredName: Household Survey If Answered A Few Times a Year Or More Frequently for the Experience Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated reason of why they answered "a few times a year" or more frequently that they had these experiences.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Household Survey If Answered A Few Times a Year Or More Frequently Reason for the Experience
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes._A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people._A directive to do something if a question was answered in a particular way._Happening a few times during a year._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Greater in size, amount, extent, or degree._Coming at short intervals or in great quantities._A question about what an individual feels is the reason for their experiences.

Concepts.definition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes.
A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The pattern of a person's emotional, romantic, and/or sexual attractions.

Concepts.definition: The pattern of a person's emotional, romantic, and/or sexual attractions.

PermissibleValues.value: Some other aspect of your physical appearance

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response about some other aspect of an individual's physical appearance.

Concepts.definition: A response about some other aspect of an individual's physical appearance.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.

Concepts.definition: The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Height; the vertical dimension of extension; distance from the base of something to the top.

Concepts.definition: The vertical measurement or distance from the base to the top of an object; the vertical dimension of extension.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A personal or institutionalized system grounded in belief and reverence for a supernatural power or powers regarded as creator and governor of the universe. (from dictionary.com)

Concepts.definition: A personal or institutionalized system grounded in belief and reverence for a supernatural power or powers regarded as creator and governor of the universe. (from dictionary.com)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A period or stage in life, usually stated in years since birth.

Concepts.definition: How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Major living subspecies of man differentiated by genetic and physical characteristics. There are four racial groups: Australoid, Caucasoid, Mongoloid, and Negroid.

Concepts.definition: A geographic ancestral origin category that is assigned to a population group based mainly on physical characteristics that are thought to be distinct and inherent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of the societal roles expected for the two sexes.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics of people that are socially constructed, including norms, behaviors, and roles based on sex. As a social construct, gender varies from society to society and can change over time. (Adapted from WHO.)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: System of classification based on nation from which a person originates, regardless of the nation in which he/she currently resides.

Concepts.definition: System of classification based on nation from which a person originates, regardless of the nation in which he/she currently resides.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ReferenceDocuments.name: If you answered A few times
ReferenceDocuments.description: If you answered A few times a year" or more frequently to at least one question, what do you think is the main reason for these experiences?

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
